description: Number of partitions of n into 7 nonzero squares.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: b:= proc(n, i, t) option remember; `if`(n=0, `if`(t=0, 1, 0),      `if`(i<1 or t<1, 0, b(n, i-1, t)+      `if`(i^2>n, 0, b(n-i^2, i, t-1))))    end:a:= n-> b(n, isqrt(n), 7):seq(a(n), n=0..120);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 30 2014
author: _David W. Wilson_
